create.desc: Create a new table with the specified name and column families

put.desc: Insert or update a row in a table with the specified row key, column family, column name, and value

get.desc: Retrieve the value of a specific column from a row in a table with the specified row key

scan.desc: Scan a table and retrieve all rows and columns

delete.desc: Delete a specific version of a column in a row in a table with the specified row key

deleteall.desc: Delete all versions of a row in a table with the specified row key

drop.desc: Drop a table and permanently delete all data in the table

dropall.desc: Disable and drop all tables in HBase

disable.desc: Disable a table and prevent any further operations on it

enable.desc: Enable a table that has been disabled

is_enabled.desc: Check if a table is enabled or disabled

alter.desc: Modify the schema of a table, such as adding or removing column families or changing attributes of column families

describe.desc: Describe the schema of a table, including its column families and attributes

truncate.desc: Delete all data in a table, but keep the table and its schema intact

retruncate.desc: Delete all data in a table, create new table, copy information from previous table to new table

count.desc: Count the number of rows in a table

domany.desc: Insert or update many in one table
